Structs/ParseGeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwi.name: latitude
Structs/ParseGeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwi.abstract: Latitude of point in degrees. Valid range is from -90.0 to 90.0.

Structs/ParseGeoPoint.html#/s:10ParseSwi.abstract: Longitude of point in degrees. Valid range is from -180.0 to 180.0.

Protocols/ParseCloud.html.abstract: Objects that conform to the ParseCloud protocol are able to call Parse Cloud Functions and Jobs.

Protocols/ParseConfig.html.name: ParseConfig
Protocols/ParseConfig.html.abstract: Objects that conform to the ParseConfig protocol are able to access the Config on the Parse Server.

Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST10ParseSwi.name: deleteAll(batchLimit:options:)
Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST10ParseSwi.abstract: Deletes a collection of users synchronously all at once and throws an error if necessary.

Enums/Event.html#/s:10ParseSwift5EventO7.name: entered(_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:10ParseSwift5EventO7.abstract: The object has been updated, and is now included in the query.

Enums/Event.html#/s:10ParseSwift5EventO4.name: left(_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:10ParseSwift5EventO4.abstract: The object has been updated, and is no longer included in the query.

Enums/Event.html#/s:10ParseSwift5EventO7.name: created(_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:10ParseSwift5EventO7.abstract: The object has been created, and is a part of the query.

Enums/Event.html#/s:10ParseSwift5EventO7.name: updated(_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:10ParseSwift5EventO7.abstract: The object has been updated, and is still a part of the query.

Enums/Event.html#/s:10ParseSwift5EventO7.name: deleted(_:)
Enums/Event.html#/s:10ParseSwift5EventO7.abstract: The object has been deleted, and is no longer included in the query.

Enums/Event.html.name: Event
Enums/Event.html.abstract: Represents an update on a specific object from the ParseLiveQuery Server.

Classes/SubscriptionCallback.html#/s:10P.name: init(query:)
Classes/SubscriptionCallback.html#/s:10P.abstract: Creates a new subscription that can be used to handle updates.

Classes/SubscriptionCallback.html#/s:10P.name: handleSubscribe(_:)

Classes/SubscriptionCallback.html#/s:10P.abstract: Register a callback for when an event occurs of a specific type

Classes/Subscription.html#/s:10ParseSwif.name: event
Classes/Subscription.html#/s:10ParseSwif.abstract: Updates and notifies when there’s a new event related to a specific query.

Classes/Subscription.html#/s:10ParseSwif.name: subscribed
Classes/Subscription.html#/s:10ParseSwif.abstract: Updates and notifies when a subscription request has been fulfilled and if it is new.

Classes/Subscription.html#/s:10ParseSwif.name: unsubscribed
Classes/Subscription.html#/s:10ParseSwif.abstract: Updates and notifies when an unsubscribe request has been fulfilled.

Classes/Subscription.html#/s:10ParseSwif.name: init(query:)
Classes/Subscription.html#/s:10ParseSwif.abstract: Creates a new subscription that can be used to handle updates.

Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.name: receiveDelegate
Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.abstract: Have ParseLiveQuery connection metrics, errors, etc delegated to you. A delegate

Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.name: isSocketEstablished
Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.abstract: True if the connection to the url is up and available. False otherwise.

Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.name: isConnected
Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.abstract: True if this client is connected. False otherwise.

Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.name: isConnecting
Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.abstract: True if this client is connecting. False otherwise.

Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.name: setDefault(_:)
Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.abstract: Set a specific ParseLiveQuery client to be the default for all ParseLiveQuery connections.

Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.name: getDefault()
Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.abstract: Get the default ParseLiveQuery client for all LiveQuery connections.

Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.name: isSubscribed(_:)
Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.abstract: Check if a query has an active subscription on this ParseLiveQuery client.

Classes/ParseLiveQuery.html#/s:10ParseSw.abstract: Remove a pending subscription on this ParseLiveQuery client.
